reg_pit.title: Property Transfer Tax Exemption Regulation No. 13

change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 68/2017, effective March 1, 2017.

reg:regulation.reg:title: Property Transfer Tax Exemption Regulation No. 13

bcl:section.bcl:text: Transfer to Ucluth Development Corporation of the property described below is exempt from tax payable under the Property Transfer Tax Act:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: Block A, District Log 468, Clayoquot District as shown on Plan VIP87462, PID 028-106-946

bcl:section.bcl:text: This regulation is retroactive to December 15, 2009, with effect on and after that date.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Property Transfer Tax Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 378, section 37]
